#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string c;
    std::getline(std::cin,c);
    string s="";
    for(int j=0;j<c.length();j++)
    {
        if(c[j]=='a' || c[j]=='e' || c[j]=='i' || c[j]=='o' || c[j]=='u')
        {
            s=s+c[j];
            j=j+2;
        }
        else
            s=s+c[j];
    }
    cout<<s<<endl;

    return 0;
}
